title: Unbeatable townhouse in the highly sought after Arlington
posting_body: Come see this sunny and spacious multi-level townhouse located on a quiet dead end street!!!.

This property truly encompasses everything from new gleaming hardwood floors, eat in fully applianced kitchen, stainless steel, granite, 2 giant and newly updated bathrooms, huge bedrooms, living & dining room, gas heat, parking laundry and giant deck overlooking the back yard.
In addition to cosmetically being a dream it also is located steps from the center with all the best shops, restaurants, markets and highways/ public transportation.
